hero.name: Pavan Vanjre Ravindranath
hero.title: Hi, I'm a
hero.description: Software Developer based in the United States with over three years of experience building scalable, high-performance web applications using modern technologies.

about.title: About Me
content: Iâ€™m a Software Engineer with a Masterâ€™s degree in Computer Science and strong industry experience in building scalable, full-stack applications. My journey through roles at HashedIn by Deloitte and Apex Analytix has given me hands-on exposure to the entire software development lifecycle.

My technical toolkit includes React, JavaScript, Python, and Java, along with cloud and DevOps technologies like AWS, Docker, and Kubernetes. I enjoy turning complex challenges into clean, performant solutions, whether itâ€™s enhancing UX, optimizing backend performance, or streamlining CI/CD pipelines.

Iâ€™m passionate about crafting products that make a real impact, combining strong engineering principles with a user-focused mindset. Every project is an opportunity to learn, collaborate, and build something meaningful.

skills.title: Technologies I Master
skills.subtitle: From front-end finesse to back-end power, here's the tech I use to build robust applications.

items.title: Graduate Teaching Assistant
items.company: University of North Carolina at Charlotte
description: Provided one-on-one and group support to students, clarifying complex concepts like TCP/IP, multithreading, and virtual memory
Designed and graded assignments, labs, and quizzes to assess students' understanding of operating systems and networking fundamentals
Conducted hands-on lab sessions to teach practical skills in Linux system administration, shell scripting, and network configuration
Collaborated with the professor to improve course materials and ensure alignment with learning objectives
Mentored students in debugging code and troubleshooting network-related issues

items.title: Automation Developer Intern
description: Built a CI/CD pipeline with Azure DevOps, reducing deployment time by 40% via automated containerization and Kubernetes.
Designed and developed an automation bot using UiPath for scheduling meetings, reducing manual overhead by 20%.
Modernized a legacy project by containerizing it and deploying it on a Kubernetes cluster, improving scalability.

items.title: Software Engineer II
description: Led Agile sprints, improving project delivery speed by 20% while maintaining a high standard of code quality and client satisfaction.
Analyzed Amplitude logs, identifying user drop-off points, implemented innovative solutions that increased engagement by 15%.
Developed a proof of concept to consolidate payment information from multiple iFrames into a single page.
Resolved critical checkmarx issues within a legacy codebase, resulting in an impressive 10% improvement in risk score.
Optimized data retrieval processes, improving user experience and reducing retrieval time by 15%.
Implemented fingerprint and Proof-of-Address capture feature to enhance eKYC accuracy and streamline onboarding compliance.

items.title: Software Engineer I
description: Optimized how the application managed its database, reducing query times by 40% and decreasing server load by 25%.
Collaborated with design team on Figma to elevate the application's UI/UX, achieving significant enhancements in user experience.
Designed a custom sorting algorithm to efficiently process large, unstructured datasets, improving data processing speed by 30%.
Developed RESTful APIs, ensuring seamless data formatting and integration across distributed computing environments.
Designed a multi-language content display system tailored to user country, improving content management and user experience.
Introduced a responsive design feature, ensuring optimal functionality across all mobile and tablet devices
Built Gulp tasks to auto-lint TypeScript with ESLint and Prettier, reducing lint errors by 70%.

items.title: Software Engineer Intern
description: Developed unit test cases for React components using Jest, increasing test coverage by 45% and reducing defects by 20%.
Created a custom CSS library to standardize styling, enhancing design consistency and cutting development time by 15%.
Integrated Web Accessibility standards achieve WCAG 2.1 compliance, expanding access for over 12% of users with disabilities

projects.title: Projects Experiences
projects.subtitle: A showcase of my recent work and personal projects

items.title: Transhipment Tracking System
items.description: a web application for real-time shipment tracking with secure authentication, dynamic dashboards, and interactive data visualizations and seamless user experience.

items.title: Crop Prediction System
items.description: Web applicaiton that predicts the crop based on the soil, water and weather conditions.

items.title: Shortest Paths in a Network
items.description: Java implementation of Dijkstra's Algorithm with dynamic graph updates and reachable node detection.

items.title: Car Crash Analysis in USA
items.description: Interactive D3.js visualization analyzing fatal car crash data with spatial maps, temporal trends, and hotspot identification across US states.

items.title: Climatics: Analysis of Climate Change
items.description: Interactive D3.js dashboard analyzing climate change impacts on global temperatures, emissions, and seasonal variations with geo-maps.

items.title: SPECTRE: Visual Speech-Aware 3D Facial Expression Reconstruction
items.description: PyTorch-based method for 3D facial expression reconstruction from videos, preserving speech perception in talking head models.

items.title: World Climate Data Analysis Dashboard
items.description: Interactive data visualization project built with Observable and D3.js for exploring and analyzing datasets with reactive JavaScript notebooks.

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.subtitle: I'm always open to discussing new opportunities and interesting projects
contact.heading: Let's Connect
contact.description: Whether you have a project in mind, want to collaborate, or just want to say hello, I'd love to hear from you. Feel free to reach out through any of the channels below.

message.label: Message
message.placeholder: Tell me about your project or just say hello!
